Package Models.Data

Class CoupleSeat

java.lang.Object
Models.Data.Seat
Models.Data.CoupleSeat
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class CoupleSeat extends Seat
Stores the data for a CoupleSeat object. CoupleSeat extends a regular Seat as a special variant of a Seat.
Since:
2022-11-11
Version:
1.0
Author:
Phee Kian Ann
